data.title: Citizen participation and its impact on the management model of the decentralized autonomous municipal government of Quevedo
data.text:
The objective of this research is to evaluate citizen participation that allows the implementation of a new management model of the Municipality of Canton Quevedo, where there is a more proactive citizenship in the formulation, planning, execution and control of public policies, the research will detect the shortcomings of neighborhood leaders in citizen participation. The universe of the research will be through a census of 112 presidents of neighborhood councils in the different urban parishes of Quevedo Canton and also the mayor, councilors and officials of the Municipal Decentralized Autonomous Government of Quevedo Canton. Inductive and deductive methods will be used to obtain the information. The results will allow identifying the key to improve the performance of neighborhood leaders in the use of citizen participation mechanisms and the management model of the Municipal Decentralized Autonomous Government of Quevedo.
